answers.answer: Hi!If it is MSSA or methicillin sensitive infection, then the treatment of choice is penicillin. Usually penicillinase-resistant β-lactam antibiotics are used: oxacillin or flucloxacillin. This helps overcome penicillin resistance. At times gentamycin is added if the infection is considered serious, or if patient has diabetes or an immune-compromised state.Please consult your grandfather's treating doctor regarding this. Take care!
